description: The three-year-old `youngest son` of the Midarezaki family. He is a biological weapon made from the flesh of Enka that bears the name of `The Black Thirteenth`. He enjoys watching television and seems to be the only one that can eat Kyouka meals (but this could be due to the fact he doesn`t have a stomach or taste buds).
name: Midarezaki Hyouka
